languages.text: На колонии обнаружены тайные общины еретиков. Говорят, Кунрад Войгтвир лично посещал планету и сеял на ней семена скверны.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
languages.original_text: На колонии обнаружены тайные общины еретиков. Говорят, Кунрад Войгтвир лично посещал планету и сеял на ней семена скверны.

traits.locale_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
A new appearance of Kunrad Voigtvir: this time he's behind an organisation of secret communities discussing forbidden knowledge.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
Kunrad Voigtvir has made a new appearance: this time he's behind an organisation of secret societies devoted to discussing forbidden knowledge.
Kunrad Voigtvir has made a new appearance: this time he's behind an organisation of secret societies devoted to discussing forbidden knowledge.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

languages.text: Des communautés hérétiques clandestines ont été découvertes dans le monde colonie. Le bruit court que Voigtvir en personne est venu sur la planète à plusieurs reprises afin d'y semer les graines de la corruption.
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Des communautés hérétiques clandestines ont été découvertes dans le monde colonie. Le bruit court que Voigtvir en personne est venu sur la planète à plusieurs reprises afin d'y semer les graines de la corruption.

languages.text: コロニー惑星で秘密裏に活動していた異端の共同体が発見された。噂によると、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが何度かこの惑星を自ら訪れ、腐敗の種をまいたという。
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

traits.locale_text: コロニー惑星で秘密裏に活動していた異端の共同体が発見された。噂によると、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルが何度かこの惑星を自ら訪れ、腐敗の種をまいたという。

languages.text: 你的臣民在这个殖民地世界发现了秘密的异端教派。有传言说，昆拉德·维特威尔曾多次造访这颗行星，亲手播撒下了腐化的种子。
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 你的臣民在这个殖民地世界发现了秘密的异端教派。有传言说，昆拉德·维特威尔曾多次造访这颗行星，亲手播撒下了腐化的种子。

languages.text: Unas comunidades herejes han sido descubiertas en el mundo colonia. Se rumorea que el propio Kunrad Voigtvir ha visitado el planeta repetidamente para sembrar la corrupción.
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Unas comunidades herejes han sido descubiertas en el mundo colonia. Se rumorea que el propio Kunrad Voigtvir ha visitado el planeta repetidamente para sembrar la corrupción.

languages.text: Auf der Koloniewelt wurden geheime Gemeinschaften von Ketzern entdeckt. Gerüchten zufolge hat Kunrad Voigtvir höchstselbst den Planeten mehrfach besucht, um Zwietracht zu säen.
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Koloniewelt wurden geheime Gemeinschaften von Ketzern entdeckt. Gerüchten zufolge hat Kunrad Voigtvir höchstselbst den Planeten mehrfach besucht, um Zwietracht zu säen.

languages.text: Koloni dünyasında gizli kâfir toplulukları keşfedildi. Söylentilere göre Kunrad Voigtvir, yozlaşma tohumları ekmek için gezegeni bizzat birkaç kez ziyaret etmiş.
languages.original_text: Secret heretical communities have been discovered on the colony world. Rumour has it that Kunrad Voigtvir himself paid several visits to the planet to sow seeds of corruption.
